name: Piloteer (itch)
description:
Instructions -
The game is played in discreet phases. First you must place your movement selections by clicking the mouse, then hit the commit button in the lower righthand corner to lock them in. After similarly choosing and committing your firing selections, the turn will run. 

At any time during the planning phase you can cancel a selection by right-clicking.

If you have managed to power up your auxillary systems, you can use them to power up a shield or a powerful vulcan attack.
